channel.title: osi on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in osi on Cisco Skills

item.title: The OSI Layer
item.description: It is the foundation that makes understanding networks possible the wonderful OSI layer. While studying for the CCENT exam I had a basic understanding of the OSI Model but when reviewing the material I found myself saying over and over, "Oh ya I remember that"! meaning I totally forgot about a certain protocol or how and what services where in each layer. So I wrote down the basics on the ITS forum and decided why not post it here as well.
